body:
So yeah, Iv'e been wondering are there any of you guys who are like Extreme, Die Hard sports fans out there? 


Iv'e been a pretty huge sports fan my whole life, I'm a huge Golden State Warriors fan, as well for the 49ers and FC Barcelona! What is your team(s)? And would you consider yourself a Die hard fan?

Happy Thinking!

AeroScape

title: DieHard Sports fans anywhere?

replies.body: I surf, and I guess that's a pretty extreme sport where guys die REALLY hard.

replies.body:
I like Hockey, Soccer and Rugby :)
Used to be a die hard for hockey (Pens will win next year xd, we had a bad season ending with many injuries).
Never was a die hard soccer fan, but when I do watch soccer I prefer the (penguins <-- Realized that is the stupid answer I've ever give xd) I meant I prefer Arsenal lmfao, not the pens :).
Just started liking rugby (joined school team), don't have a particular team that I like, but I'm surely gonna watch the all blacks, Africa, Romania & Canada when the world championships come later this year :)

I am Canadian and I love Chicago Blackhawks (Hockey)
and in soccer I like a couple of teams my favorites are Juventus (I'm half Italian) BVB. Dortmund (German team) and MLS (Canadian)

replies.body: I am a die hard San Francisco Giants fan (Baseball) and a pretty loyal Sacramento Kings (Basketball) and FC Barcelona (Soccer/Association Football) fan. I also like the San Francisco 49ers.
